Text.Page:
This is insane. I've a request, directly from Velika, no less.

Despite the ridiculous dangers involved, I need you to recover basilisk eggs. Even though it's nesting season and the basilisks are extra touchy, they want the eggs. I hate politics.

Hrm. I guess I expected something more grand; less ordinary.

These hardly seem worth risking your life over, but at least the powers that be will be placated.

Thanks, .
I realize it seems like a fool's errand, but the consul in Velika feels otherwise.
